bill.title: Robert E. Lee Building; authorize DFA to sell.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Department Of Finance And Administration, Upon Consultation With The Chairmen Of The Public Property Committees Of The Mississippi House Of Representatives And Senate, To Sell And Convey The Property Located At 239 North Lamar Street In The City Of Jackson, Hinds County, Mississippi, Known As The "robert E. Lee Building"; To Require That The Conveyance Of The Property Must Be Accompanied By A Long-term Lease For Use Of The Robert E. Lee Parking Garage; To Authorize The Department To Retain Any Easement Associated With The Properties Sold And Leased Under The Provisions Of This Act For Historic Preservation Purposes; To Require That The Money Derived From The Sale Of The Property Be Deposited In The State General Fund; And For Related Purposes.
